A wearable keychain that doubles as a smart device with augmented reality (AR) capabilities, allowing users to unlock doors, cars, and other secure areas using their smartwatch or phone.
A keychain that incorporates a miniature projector, enabling users to project a digital key onto a door or surface, eliminating the need for physical keys.
A keychain that includes a built-in, high-resolution camera and AI-powered facial recognition software, allowing users to unlock doors and secure areas using their face.
A keychain that doubles as a portable power bank, providing users with a compact and convenient way to charge their devices on-the-go.

A keychain that incorporates a built-in GPS tracker, allowing users to locate their keychain if it's lost or stolen, and receive notifications if someone tries to access their secured areas without permission.
